medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive lesions from Orf virus infection.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Lesions developed over a 3-week period on both upper extremities after contact with kid goats that had perioral crusting. The patient's condition worsened despite treatment, including surgical debridement and cidofovir therapy.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of unremitting follicular, predominantly small-cleaved cell non-Hodgkins lymphoma and rheumatoid arthritis.
medical_history.social_history: Patient lived and worked on a farm housing sheep, goats, poultry, and farm cats.
